official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the development of a single vaccine to provide lifelong immunization against common childhood diseases.

summary.text: Children's Vaccine Initiative Amendments Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the National Institutes of Health to develop a single-dose, multiple-antigen compound vaccine that can be easily administered to children under age six and that will provide lifelong immunization against common childhood diseases. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the development of a single vaccine to provide lifelong immunization against common childhood diseases.
